item.description:
There are a couple things I'd like to discuss, but a lot of this will have to be done through e-mail:

Scheduling base line readings at Central Wave, and the investigation itself.
Business cards and the website.
Additional investigation sites - places we can access easily (I'd like to do a couple basic investigations and develop a level of proficiency and organization before we start tackling some of the more peculiar places).

There's going to be a lot more "business" discussed at this meeting than some of the others, so if you plan on participating actively, this might be a good one to attend! I chose the mall because it's easy to find, there's something to do if you get there early, and because it's not so easy to find a place that holds 20+ people without fixed reservations. This is still only an interrim meeting place, so I'm still looking for alternatives!
item.how_to_find_us: I've added my photo to the MeetUp site, and I'll try to get a table as close to the food court entrance as is practical. I'll be wearing a bright red zip up fleece with red shoulders.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group February Meetup
